column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The wait wasn't long on a Saturday afternoon. My sister and I got a table immediately as we walked in. The seating arrangement is interesting. There are booths and tables on the side of the restaurant and 2 really long tables in the center. Our server greeted us
column3: but it didn't seem genuine. The table wasn't properly clean and you could see residue of food left behind from the previous occupant. It was gross.
